org.jpacman.framework.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpacman.framework.model.Sprite
      • org.jpacman.framework.model.Player

  • public class Player
extends Sprite
    A player, responsible for keeping track of the amount of food eaten, and whether or not he is still alive.
    Author:
    Arie van Deursen, TU Delft, 2012.
